QuestData.Title: The Tirisgarde Reborn
QuestData.Description:
The Tirisgarde is reformed. It is time we begin our mission in earnest.
The order will need leaders, and though I may be an experienced mage, I am no strategist. You have proven yourself capable, in both your past exploits and present.
Will you take on this challenge, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Receive your new title from Meryl Felstorm.
QuestData.RewardText: So you're a Conjuror now, huh? Fan-cy!$B$BWe've got a good start with this Tirisgarde thing here, but I think we should keep up the recruiting if we actually plan on invading demon-town.$B$BFortunately for you, nobody negotiates contracts like a goblin!
